Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into five registers: 1 - Two jackals on biers. 2 - Deceased seated and three kneeling female figures; eight columns of Hieroglyphic text. 3 - Three kneeling figures; eight columns of Hieroglyphic text. 4 - Four kneeling figures; eight columns of Hieroglyphic text. 5 - Six rows of Hieroglyphic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 3. (pl.13)
